refnamediv.refpurpose: Searches for all elements with given tag name in specified namespace

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.description;
DOMDocument
DOMNodeListgetElementsByTagNameNS stringnamespaceURI stringlocalName
Returns a DOMNodeList of all elements with a given local name and a namespace URI.

&reftitle.parameters;
namespaceURI
The namespace URI of the elements to match on. The special value * matches all namespaces.
localName
The local name of the elements to match on. The special value * matches all local names.
